About Onix Games

At Onix Games, we live for the pixel-perfect challenge. Our games are designed to test your skills, push your patience, and maybe even make you rage-quit (just a little). But that’s the fun of it—every tough level, every impossible jump, every game-over screen is a chance to get better, go further, and finally beat the game.

We specialize in retro-inspired pixel art games that blend nostalgia with modern mechanics, delivering an experience that’s as visually stunning as it is brutally addictive. Whether you're dodging enemies, mastering impossible platforming, or figuring out that one move that changes everything—we make sure every moment is challenging yet rewarding.

So if you love hardcore, skill-based, no-hand-holding gameplay, you’re in the right place. Welcome to Onix Games. Good luck—you’ll need it.
